Results

Ajax Requests

Echo apis are created to simulate Ajax calls: /echo/json/ for JSON, //jsfiddle.net/echo/jsonp/ for JSONP, /echo/html/ for HTML and /echo/xml/ for XML.

Please read API documentation and follow examples.

var myModule = angular.module('myModule', []);

myModule.service('myService', function($http) {
4
    $http.defaults.headers.post['Content-Type'] = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8";
5
    this.getOptions = function() {
6
        return $http({
7
            "method": "post",
8
            "url": '/echo/json/',
9
            "data": "delay=3&json=" + encodeURI(JSON.stringify({
10
                options: [
11
                    {name:'entry1', value:0},
12
                    {name:'entry2', value:1},
13
                    {name:'entry3', value:2}]
14
            }))
15
        });
16
    };
17
});
18
 
19
myModule.controller('simpleController', function($scope, myService) {
20
    $scope.selectedOption = null;
21
    $scope.options = [];
22
    $scope.logentries = [];
23
    myService.getOptions().then(function(result) {
24
        $scope.options = result.data.options;
25
        $scope.selectedOption =  {name:'111111', value:-1};
26
    });
27
    $scope.$watch('selectedOption', function(newValue, oldValue) {
28
        // handle selection change ...
29
        console.log("selection: " + $scope.selectedOption);
30
        $scope.logentries.push(($scope.logentries.length + 1) + " - selection: " + $scope.selectedOption);
31
    });
32
});
